'''''Shh... Listen!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to interact with the [[Klee|Voice Behind the Door]] from the left inner-most door in the [[Knights of Favonius Headquarters]] during ''An Ordinary Day for the Knights of Favonius'' in {{Quest|An Ordinary Day for the Knights of Favonius}}.
